experience: You and Mark both know Jason Logsdon - PMP, CSM, Mark Hayhurst, and 30 others
You both worked at Charles Schwab
You both worked at Charles Schwab from Nov 2016 to Feb 2017

Currently manage four Agile software development teams (staff of 35-FTE, onshore, nearshore & offshore) that develop and maintain critical enterprise level services for all channels that support Schwab’s main goal of helping clients own their tomorrow.  Driving three critical project deliverables associated with Banking & Money transfers, Application Cloud migration (Pivotal Cloud Foundry), and Aggregation of account balances.•	Manage delivery of innovative .NET and Java web services working with cutting edge technologies.  •	Led first team to complete proof of concept and adopt Atlassian’s continuous delivery toolset for Schwab.  •	Currently revamping schwab.com’s account summary page to provide aggregation of client’s internal and external account information.  This will provide clients ability to see external account info and track net worth. •	Grew team from 5 to 35 resources in 2 years and scaled project delivery for various channels within Schwab.

Managed four Agile software development teams (staff of 28 – FTE, onshore, nearshore & offshore) that developed and maintained a client facing portal used by hospitality, retail and stadium clients, along with internal AT&T Operation teams. The interactive portal, AT&T Wi-Fi Services Central Command product, is a network management tool that provides customers access to Wi-Fi statistics and monitoring/reporting of day-to-day operation.•	Led development of AT&T’s first client facing tool to provide critical Wi-Fi network data in an interactive dashboard.•	Rated number one tool used by stadiums to monitor Wi-Fi usage\traffic to better understand client needs.

Served as Scrum Master over four AT&T’s Wi-Fi Application Development teams.  The teams developed a portal that hospitality and retail clients, along with internal AT&T Operation teams, use to manage their internal Wi-Fi networks. This portal (Central Command) collects and delivers a large amount of data and interfaces with high transactional systems:•	Scrum mastered top four performing Scrum teams at AT&T Wi-Fi Services•	Improved team productivity 65% and predictability 45% from 2010 to 2011 •	Served as Vendor Manager overseeing relationship between AT&T and external vendors.

Managed two transition projects that divided the company’s processor/chip design and manufacturing processes into two separate companies.  Responsible for ensuring the newly created company (GlobalFoundries) had the IT infrastructure in place to stand alone as well as re-engineered the Supply Chain Management processes to ensure orders could be processed flawlessly. Both projects came in on time and under budget.

Richard Reynolds
Senior Technical Director at AT&T Wi-Fi Services
April 20, 2015, Mark worked with Richard in different groups

I have to say that Richard is one of the most passionate professionals in IT that I've ever had the opportunity to worked with.  Over the past few years I've had the chance to witness Richard's dedication and committment to ensuring IT projects were not only thoroughly thought through but that they were the right fit for the company at the given time.   Richard has ability to motivate others to share that vision and it shows in his work. In one example, he and his team designed and implemented a multi-million dollar identity governance project that centralized application management and also provided federated services to our largest customers. That effort was huge, and it was the most complex project ever attempted by the IT organization. Richard successfully worked across multiple teams and disciplines to pull it off seamlessly, and our customers were absolutely delighted!  I would highly recommend Richard to positions where he can not only use his leadership skills but his ability to analyze and implement solutions for internal and external customers.

summary: As a skilled leader well-versed in Agile methodology, I excel in driving the development and maintenance of high performance teams focused on meeting the information needs and deliverables of multiple internal and external channels and clients.   My ability to lead various staffing models (FTEs, Onshore, Nearshore, and Offshore) depicts the innovative ways I create teaming amongst the larger team.  My strengths are well suited in an environment where I can utilize my customer oriented skills in further developing business along with the ability to motivate, coach and inspire others.   Specialties: 12 years People Management, 10 years Agile Methodology, 4 years continuous delivery experience, 13 Years PMI Certified Project Management Professional (PMP),  Certified Scrum Master, Six Sigma Certified, 15 years of IT Operations Management, over 4 years of Finance, experience in both small (start-ups) and large scale companies, and vendor management (onshore, nearshore and offshore).  Industries experience:  Financial Services, Computer Hardware and Services, Telecommunications, Government, Retail, Hospitality.
name: Mark Casey, PMP, CSM
title: Sr. Scrum Master at Charles Schwab
